verses.text: KA ko e ongo foha ‘o ‘Ēlone, ‘a Nātapi mo e ‘Āpiu, na‘a na to‘o takitaha ‘ene ‘ainga malala, ‘o ‘ai ki ai ha afi, ‘o tuku ki ai ha ‘inisēnisi, ‘o na ‘oatu ki he ‘ao ‘o Sihova ha afi kehe, ko e me‘a na‘e ‘ikai te ne tu‘utu‘uni kiate kinautolu.
Pea na‘e pā atu ha afi mei he ‘ao ‘o Sihova, ‘o keina kinaua, ‘o na pekia ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova.

Pea lea ai ‘a Mōsese kia ‘Ēlone, ko eni ia na‘e folofola‘aki ‘e Sihova, ‘o pehē, Te u tāpuhā‘ia ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku taka ofi mai, pea te u lāngilangi‘ia ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai kotoa. Pea na‘e longo pē ‘a ‘Ēlone.

Pea na‘e ui ange ‘e Mōsese ‘a Misaeli mo ‘Elisafani, ko e ongo foha ‘o ‘Osieli, ko e tu‘asina ‘o ‘Ēlone, ‘o ne pehē kiate kinaua, ‘Unu‘unu mai: ‘ave homou kāinga mei he mata Fale Tapu ki he tu‘a ‘apitanga.
Ko ia na‘a na ‘unu‘unu atu, ‘o na ‘ave ai pē kinaua mo hona sote ki he tu‘a ‘apitanga, hangē ko e me‘a ‘a Mōsese.

Pea lea ‘a Mōsese kia ‘Ēlone, pea kia ‘Eliesa mo ‘Ītama ko hono ongo foha, ‘Oua ‘e tuku mafue homou ‘ulu, pea ‘oua ‘e hae homou kofu; koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou mate, pea ke ‘oua ‘e tō ha houhau ki he fakataha kotoa: kae tuku ki homou kāinga, ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli kātoa, ke tēngihia ‘a e faka‘auha kuo fai ‘e Sihova.
Pea ‘e ‘ikai te mou hū mai mei he matapā ‘o e Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga, na‘a mou mate, he ko e lolo pani ‘a Sihova ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu. Pea na‘a nau fai hangē ko e lea ‘a Mōsese.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia ‘Ēlone, ‘o pehē,
‘Oua ‘e inu ha uaine pe ha kava mālohi, ‘a koe pe ko ho ngaahi foha, ‘oka mou ka hū ki he Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga, telia na‘a mou mate (ko e tapu ta‘engata ia ki homou ngaahi to‘utangata):
pea koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo ‘a e faikehekehe ‘o e me‘a ‘oku tapu mo e me‘a ‘oku palahi, mo e me‘a ‘oku ta‘ema‘a mo e me‘a ‘oku ma‘a;
pea ke mou ako ki ha‘a ‘Isileli ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a ia kuo folofola‘aki ‘e Sihova kiate kinautolu ‘ia Mōsese.

Pea lea ‘a Mōsese kia ‘Ēlone, pea kia ‘Eliesa mo ‘Ītama ko hono ongo foha na‘e toe, ‘o pehē, To‘o ‘a e feilaulau-me‘akai, ‘a e me‘a ‘oku toe ‘i he ngaahi feilaulau ‘a Sihova fai‘aki ‘a e afi, pea mou kai ia ta‘eha lēvani ‘i he tafa‘aki ‘o e ‘ōlita: he ko e me‘a toputapu ia.
Pea te mau kai ia ‘i ha potu ‘oku tapu; he ko ho ‘inasi, mo e ‘inasi ‘o ho ngaahi foha ‘i he ngaahi feilaulau ‘a Sihova ‘oku feia ‘aki ‘a e afi: he na‘e pehē hoku fekau.

Pea ko e fatafata tākalo mo e tefito alanga hapai te mou kai ‘i ha potu ‘oku ma‘a; ‘a koe, mo ho‘o fānau tangata, mo ho‘o fānau fefine, fakataha: he kuo foaki ia ko ho ‘inasi, mo e ‘inasi ‘o ho ngaahi foha, mei he ngaahi feilaulau-‘ofa ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli,

te nau ‘omi ‘a e tefito alanga ‘oku hapai ‘aki, mo e fatafata ‘oku tākalo ‘aki, fakataha mo e ngaahi ngako ‘oku tutu, ke feia ‘aki ha feilaulau-tākalo ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova; pea ‘e ‘a‘au ia mo ho ngaahi foha foki, ko e ‘inasi ta‘engata; ‘o hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Eiki.
Pea fiu‘a kumi ‘e Mōsese ‘a e kosi tangata feilaulau-angahala, pea tā kuo faka‘auha ia ‘aki ‘a e afi: pea na‘a ne ‘ita kia ‘Eliesa mo ‘Ītama, ko e ongo foha ‘o ‘Ēlone na‘e toe, ‘o ne pehē,

Ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai te mou kai ‘a e feilaulau-angahala ‘i ha potu tapu; he ko ha me‘a toputapu ia, pea kuo ne ‘atu ia kiate kimoutolu ke ‘ave ‘a e kovi ‘o e fakataha, ke fai ha fakalelei ma‘anautolu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova?
Tā na‘e ‘ikai ‘omi hono toto ki he loto Potu Tapu: na‘e totonu ke mou kai ia ‘i he Potu Tapu, ‘o hangē ko ‘eku fekau.

Pea lea ‘a ‘Ēlone kia Mōsese; Vakai, ko e ‘aho eni ia na‘a nau ‘atu ‘enau feilaulau-angahala ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova, mo ‘enau feilaulau-mōifua; pea kuo hoko kiate au ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pehē mo pehē: pea ka ne u kai ‘a e feilaulau-angahala he ‘aho ni, ‘e hōifua ai koā ‘a e finangalo ‘o Sihova?
Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘a Mōsese ki ai, na‘e hā lelei kiate ia.
